column20: Normal Attack: Perform up to 5 rapid strikes.
column21: Charged Attack: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.
column22: Plunging Attack: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.
column169: Unleashes a frigid blast, dealing Cryo DMG to opponents in front of Kaeya.
column204: Coalescing the frost in the air, Kaeya summons 3 icicles that revolve around him. These icicles will follow the character around and deal Cryo DMG to opponents in their path for the ability's duration.
column269: Cold-Blooded Strike: Every hit with Frostgnaw regenerates HP for Kaeya equal to 15% of his ATK.
column270: Glacial Heart: Opponents Frozen by Frostgnaw will drop additional Elemental Particles. Frostgnaw may only produce a maximum of 2 additional Elemental Particles per use.
column271: Excellent Blood: The CRIT Rate of Kaeya's Normal and Charge Attacks against opponents affected by Cryo is increased by 15%.
column272: Never-Ending Performance: Every time Glacial Waltz defeats an opponent during its duration, its duration is increased by 2.5s, up to a maximum of 15s.
column273: Dance of Frost: Increases the Level of Frostgnaw by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
column274: Frozen Kiss: Triggers automatically when Kaeya's HP falls below 20%: Creates a shield that absorbs damage equal to 30% of Kaeya's Max HP. Lasts for 20s. This shield absorbs Cryo DMG with 250% efficiency. Can only occur once every 60s.
column275: Frostbiting Embrace: Increases the Level of Glacial Waltz by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
column276: Glacial Whirlwind: Glacial Waltz will generate 1 additional icicle, and will regenerate 15 Energy when cast.
